com.soa.policy.wspolicy.handler

Class WSPHandlerChainFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.soa.policy.wspolicy.handler.WSPHandlerChainFactory

  • public class WSPHandlerChainFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    HandlerFactory implementation that creates WSPHandlers in one chain. The factory is dynamic. If a factory is added or removed any handler chain created by this factory will be updated to reflect the change.
    Since:
    6.0

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String EFFECTIVE_POLICY_PROP 
      static java.lang.String POLICY_MARSHALLER_PROP

      Configures a comparator to be used for sorting handler factories.

    • Constructor Detail

      • WSPHandlerChainFactory

        public WSPHandlerChainFactory(com.soa.collection.PartialOrderComparator<WSPHandlerFactory> c)
        Configures a comparator to be used for sorting handler factories. The order of the factories dictates the order of the handlers put in the generated chains.
        Parameters:
        c - PartialOrderComparator for WSPHandlerFactories.

    • Method Detail

      • create

        public MessageHandler create(HandlerContext context,
                             HandlerRole role)
                      throws GException
        Creates a WSPHandler that will implement or enforce ws-policies for messages with the given context.
        Parameters:
        context - HandlerContext providing the context around how the handler will be used. The context passed in must be a WSDLHandlerContext implementation.
        role - HandlerRole in which the handler will act.
        Returns:
        MessageHandler implementation, or null if a MessageHandler is not needed based on the context provided.
        Throws:
        GException - Thrown if an error was encountered trying to create the handler.

      • createHandlerChain

        protected com.soa.policy.wspolicy.handler.ext.PolicyHandlerChain createHandlerChain(Policy effectivePolicy,
                                                                                    HandlerContext context,
                                                                                    HandlerRole role,
                                                                                    boolean saveHandler)
                                                                             throws GException
        Throws:
        GException

      • clear

        public void clear()
        Breaks the association between this factory and the MessageHandler created by the factory. This will cause the handler to no longer be updated.

      • factoryAdded

        public void factoryAdded(WSPHandlerFactory factory,
                         java.util.Map properties)
                  throws GException
        Adds a factory to the chain factory. All chains created by this factory will be updated to add handlers created by this new factory if needed.
        Parameters:
        factory - WSPHandlerFactory to be used to create handlers in generated handler chains.
        properties - Map of String properties keyed by String names identifying characteristics of the added factory.
        Throws:
        GException - Thrown if an error was encountered updating handler chains previously created by this factory.

      • factoryRemoved

        public void factoryRemoved(WSPHandlerFactory factory,
                           java.util.Map properties)
        Removes a factory from the chain factory. All chains created by this factory will be updated to remove handlers created by this old factory if needed.
        Parameters:
        factory - WSPHandlerFactory to be removed.
        properties - Map of String properties keyed by String names identifying characteristics of the removed factory.
        Throws:
        GException - Thrown if an error was encountered updating handler chains previously created by this factory.
